languages.text: {n}Тяжело опираясь как на костыль на насквозь латанное-перелатанное лазружье, каким-то чудом все еще не развалившееся на куски, сержант Вигастис, растерянно смотрит на Ревущих и Злобу. Сам он выглядит под стать — страшные раны на руках и груди кое-как заштопаны и туго перевязаны бинтами, щедро пропитавшимися запекшейся кровью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Тяжело опираясь как на костыль на насквозь латанное-перелатанное лазружье, каким-то чудом все еще не развалившееся на куски, сержант Вигастис, растерянно смотрит на Ревущих и Злобу. Сам он выглядит под стать — страшные раны на руках и груди кое-как заштопаны и туго перевязаны бинтами, щедро пропитавшимися запекшейся кровью.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes stares in bewilderment at the Shriekers and Malice. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тяжело опираясь как на костыль на насквозь латанное-перелатанное лазружье, каким-то чудом все еще не развалившееся на куски, сержант Вигастис, растерянно смотрит на Ревущих и Злобу. Сам он выглядит под стать — страшные раны на руках и груди кое-как заштопаны и туго перевязаны бинтами, щедро пропитавшимися запекшейся кровью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and a minor miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is staring in bewilderment at the Shriekers and Malice. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest were hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages thoroughly soaked in dried blood.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and a minor miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is staring in bewilderment at the Shriekers and Malice. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest were hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages thoroughly soaked in dried blood.{/n}

The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest were hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages thoroughly soaked in dried blood.{/n}

The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}ヴィガスト軍曹は、幾度もの修理と、ちょっとした奇跡によって持ちこたえた驚くほどボロボロのラスガンにもたれかかり、シュリーカーとマリスを困惑した様子で見つめる。軍曹自身もその武器とまるで同じような姿だ。腕と胸に負ったひどい傷は雑に縫合され、乾燥した血がたっぷり染み込んだ包帯でしっかりと巻かれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes stares in bewilderment at the Shriekers and Malice. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィガスト軍曹は、幾度もの修理と、ちょっとした奇跡によって持ちこたえた驚くほどボロボロのラスガンにもたれかかり、シュリーカーとマリスを困惑した様子で見つめている。軍曹自身もその武器とまるで同じような姿だ。腕と胸に負ったひどい傷は雑に縫合され、乾燥した血がたっぷり染み込んだ包帯でしっかりと巻かれていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}维加斯特军士疲惫地靠在一把破破烂烂的激光枪上。这把激光枪不知经过多少次临时修理，到现在竟然还能用，简直可以称得上是奇迹。军士咬紧牙关，以困惑的目光盯着恶棍和他手下的尖啸者。他本人看起来就像他的武器一样破烂不堪，手臂与胸口的可怕伤口被匆匆忙忙地缝合起来，用浸透了鲜血的绷带紧紧包裹着，上面的血已经干了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes stares in bewilderment at the Shriekers and Malice. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}维加斯特军士疲惫地靠在一把破破烂烂的激光枪上。这把激光枪不知经过多少次临时修理，到现在竟然还能用，简直可以称得上是奇迹。军士咬紧牙关，以困惑的目光盯着恶棍和他手下的尖啸者。他本人看起来就像他的武器一样破烂不堪，手臂与胸口的可怕伤口被匆匆忙忙地缝合起来，用浸透了鲜血的绷带紧紧包裹着，上面的血已经干了。{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Apoyado en un rifle láser asombrosamente maltrecho, que se ha mantenido unido gracias a un montón de reparaciones de campo y a la providencia, el sargento Vigastes mira perplejo a los Aulladores y a Malicia... El propio sargento tiene un aspecto muy parecido al de su arma: las horribles heridas de sus brazos y pecho han sido cosidas a toda prisa y envueltas en vendas empapadas en sangre ya reseca.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes stares in bewilderment at the Shriekers and Malice. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Apoyado en un rifle láser asombrosamente maltrecho, que se ha mantenido unido gracias a un montón de reparaciones de campo y a un pequeño milagro, el sargento Vigastes mira perplejo a los Aulladores y a Malicia... El propio sargento tiene un aspecto muy parecido al de su arma: las horribles heridas de sus brazos y pecho han sido cosidas a toda prisa y envueltas en vendas empapadas en sangre seca.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Sergeant Vigastes stützt sich auf ein atemberaubend ramponiertes Lasergewehr, das von einer langen Geschichte provisorischer Reparaturen und Sparsamkeit gezeichnet ist. Er starrt völlig entgeistert auf die Kreischer und Tücke. Der Sergeant sieht im Grunde selbst aus wie seine Waffe: Die schrecklichen Wunden auf seinen Armen und seiner Brust wurden eilig zusammengeflickt und eng mit Verbänden umwickelt, die sich mit inzwischen getrocknetem Blut vollgesaugt haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes stares in bewilderment at the Shriekers and Malice. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sergeant Vigastes stützt sich auf ein atemberaubend ramponiertes Lasergewehr, das von einer langen Geschichte provisorischer Reparaturen im Feld und einem kleinen Wunder zusammengehalten wird. Er starrt völlig entgeistert auf die Kreischer und Tücke. Der Sergeant selbst sieht im Grunde aus wie seine Waffe: Die schrecklichen Wunden auf seinen Armen und seiner Brust wurden eilig zusammengeflickt und eng mit Verbänden umwickelt, die sich vollständig mit inzwischen vertrocknetem Blut vollgesaugt haben.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Lourdement appuyé sur un fusil laser qui ne semble tenir que par la grâce du hasard et de nombreuses réparations de fortune, le sergent Vigastes, visiblement perplexe, semble incapable de détacher son regard des Hurleurs et de Malice. Comme son arme, le sergent lui-même semble avoir été rafistolé à la hâte : les plaies béantes sur ses bras et son torse ont été grossièrement suturées et recouvertes de bandages imbibés de sang ayant depuis séché.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes stares in bewilderment at the Shriekers and Malice. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lourdement appuyé sur un fusil laser qui ne semble tenir en un seul morceau que par la grâce d'un miracle et de nombreuses réparations de fortune, le sergent Vigastes, visiblement perplexe, semble incapable de détacher son regard des Hurleurs et de Malice. Comme son arme, le sergent lui-même semble avoir été rafistolé à la hâte : les plaies béantes sur ses bras ont été grossièrement suturées et recouvertes de bandages imbibés de sang.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Geçmişteki saha onarımları ve biraz da takdiriilahiyle bir arada duran, şaşkınlık uyandıracak kadar harap hâldeki silazerine tüm gücüyle yüklenen Çavuş Vigastes, Çığırtkanlar ve Melanet'e şaşkınlık içinde bakıyor. Çavuş'un görünümü de silahından farksız duruyor: Kollarındaki ve göğsündeki dehşet uyandıran yaralar, apar topar dikilerek artık kurumuş olan kanının bulandığı sargılarla sıkıca sarılmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes stares in bewilderment at the Shriekers and Malice. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Geçmişteki saha onarımları ve biraz da takdiriilahiyle bir arada duran, şaşkınlık uyandıracak kadar harap hâldeki silazerine tüm gücüyle yüklenen Çavuş Vigastes, Çığırtkanlar ve Melanet'e şaşkınlık içinde bakıyor. Çavuş'un görünümü de silahından farksız duruyor: Kolları ve göğsündeki dehşet uyandıran yaralar, apar topar dikilerek artık kuruyan kanının sızdığı sargılarla sıkıca sarılmış.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
